pages.text: $(l:resources/malachite)Malachite$() as a material does seem perfectly suited for tools, best compared to $(item)Diamond$(), but far more easily combinable with other materials.$(br)These combinations are where the fun begins, allowing for some uniquely intricate tools.

The perfect $(l:equipment/multitool)Multitool$():$(br)$(k:sneak) + $(k:use) allows you to switch between $(thing)Silk Touch$() and $(thing)Fortune$(), mine large tunnels at once and allows you to $(thing)strip$(), $(thing)till$() and $(thing)flatten$().
Its sheer size allows you to hit foes at a larger distance.$(br)Would it not be for the $(l:resources/paltaeria)Paltaeria$() you worked in, you probably wouldn't even be able to lift it.
A powerhouse, returning to you almost instantly.$(br2)$(italic)It may have only two prongs compared to a $(item)Trident$()$(italic), but they are twice as pointy!
Shoots projectiles at a higher Speed and precision compared to a mundane $(item)Crossbow$().
